attributes.action: support DAB radio stations and save Planet Rock!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No other radio station plays such great music!  Who else plays our beloved tracks by Led Zep, AC/DC, Deep Purple, Iron Maiden, Alice Cooper, Deep Purple, Ozzy.... and erm.... Saxon?

WE LOVE PLANET ROCK

SAVE PLANET ROCK

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
